body.name: HEPA Filter Air Purifiers for Home Large Bedroom,20db Quiet Air Purifier for Allergies,Smoke,Pet Dander,Odor,Dust,Pollen,up to 1100 sqft, True HEPA Air Purifiers for Home Office (white)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 16 hrs 36 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 21 mins
features: 【PET OWNERS FRIENDLY】Pet Mode cleans the air and conserves energy, while the wide U-shaped air inlet effectively traps airborne pet fur and large particles.IOOO air purifier utilizes a HEPA filter that can effectively filter out particles such as smoke, pollen, dander, hair, and more, potentially improving air quality and promoting better health and well-being for you.

【Faster and More Energy Efficient】3 Speed Settings and High-Efficiency Air Purifier: Choose from low, medium, or high fan speed settings to meet different air conditions; Circulates room air over 4 times per hour to achieve rapid purification. Unique size and contemporary design make the IOOO HEPA Filter Air Purifiers suitable for small or medium-sized rooms, like offices and dorms.Please remove the packaging bag of the filter before first use.

【Low Decibel Operation】IOOO air purifier operates quietly, especially when the sleep mode is activated, which reduces the fan speed to the lowest setting, effectively eliminating any noticeable sound. The filtered air noise is as low as 22 dB, making it ideal for creating a peaceful and relaxing indoor environment while still providing effective purification.

【TRUE HEPA FILTER】Imported HEPA Filter and High-Efficiency Activated Carbon Filter capture the allergies and pets, smoke and remove 99.99% of pet dander,dust,pollen,odour, mold,etc. Effectively improving indoor air quality. Filters particles and air pollution of PM 2.5.

【Enjoy Fragrant Air】It features an aroma pad located below the air outlet that allows you to add 4-5 drops of your favorite essential oil (not included). As the purifier circulates fresh air, the fragrance spreads throughout the room, creating a pleasant and healthy environment for you and your family to enjoy.

【SAVE SPACE】Tired of dragging a bulky purifier back and forth, Light, travel-friendly, and compact, the IOOO Core Mini Air Purifier (7.6 × 6.8 × 11.4in) easily fits in any bedroom, office, or living room, creating less clutter and more fresh air.

【High Circulation Rate】The air purifiers for home adopts dual-channel technology and a 360° air outlet, refreshing the air 5x per hour in rooms as large as 215 ft² / 20 m² cover. The small portable air purifier is easy to place anywhere you want. One is enough to effectively improve your indoor air quality. Please use this product in the room within the area of 215 square feet / 20 square meters to get a better experience.

【Excellent Design & 2 Years Guarantee】: According to carefully designed, IOOO air purifier for home has a high-end appearance, this is the first use in the air purifiers industry, we've achieved a dipped and brushed metal texture on appearance, giving the air purifiers a stylish and sophisticated look. Almost everyone will marvel at this portable air purifier. And IOOO provide you with a 2-year replacement warranty, please rest assured.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I got this to keep dog smell out of my basement. It works well and there is no detectable dog odor. There is also a scent pad to add your own scent to if you choose. It’s quiet and compact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet little Purifier
reviews.reviewText: This product does the job Its quiet, small and easy to put anywhere. I have three cats and this helps reduce the smell drastically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great
reviews.reviewText: The product works amazing. Very satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to set up and is the perfect size. It's whisper quiet and it seems to do it's job exactly as expected. It fits neatly on my dresser and it's not an eye sore (it's super cute). It's cute, efficient, effective, small and perfect for my nightstand. It's also a decent price for a large bedroom HEPA filter. Zero complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans the air exceptionally well
reviews.reviewText: I have had this product for approximately 1 week. I am so impressed on how it purifies my living space and leaves the air so refreshed Was easy to use with a great selection of settings for the environment I will be purchasing a second purifier in the near future

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great air purifier
reviews.reviewText: Bought a Honeywell also, which was three times the price with fewer features and I returned that one to keep this gem. Love it: quiet, effective and I love that it shows you your air quality (skyrockets every time I cook).
